name: @rexeus/typeweaver
description: Command-line interface for the TypeWeaver API framework

scripts.test:bundle: pnpm run build && node dist/run-cli-with-tsx.js generate --output test/output --input test/definition --plugins clients,aws-cdk,hono
scripts.test:gen: pnpm run test:gen:types && pnpm run test:gen:clients && pnpm run test:gen:aws-cdk && pnpm run test:gen:hono && pnpm run test:gen:all
scripts.test:gen:types: tsx src/cli.ts generate --output test/outputs/types --input test/definition --shared test/definition/shared
scripts.test:gen:clients: tsx src/cli.ts generate --output test/outputs/clients --input test/definition --plugins clients --shared test/definition/shared
scripts.test:gen:aws-cdk: tsx src/cli.ts generate --output test/outputs/aws-cdk --input test/definition --plugins aws-cdk --shared test/definition/shared
scripts.test:gen:hono: tsx src/cli.ts generate --output test/outputs/hono --input test/definition --plugins hono --shared test/definition/shared
scripts.test:gen:all: tsx src/cli.ts generate --output test/outputs/all --input test/definition --plugins clients,aws-cdk,hono --shared test/definition/shared

author: Dennis Wentzien <dw@rexeus.com>
